glsa.title: LibVNCServer/LibVNCClient: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in LibVNCServer/LibVNCClient, the worst of which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code when connecting to a malicious server.

background.p: LibVNCServer/LibVNCClient are cross-platform C libraries that allow you to easily implement VNC server or client functionality in your program.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in LibVNCServer and LibVNCClient. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to connect to a malicious VNC server or leverage Man-in-the-Middle attacks to cause the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running a VNC client linked against LibVNCClient.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
